comment.caption: Bonobo apes primates unique to Congo and humankind's closest relative groom one another at a sanctuary just outside the capital Kinshasa
comment.note: Bonobo apes, primates unique to Congo and humankind's closest relative, groom one another at a sanctuary just outside the capital Kinshasa, Congo on October 31, 2006. REUTERS/Finbarr O'Reilly/File Photo
